title: 12 Pcs Foldable Beach Toys Set for Kids Sand Play Kit Bucket and Spade Beach Set Kids Collapsible Bucket, Moulds, Tools & Mesh Bag Portable Outdoor Sandpit Toys for Children
features: ⛱【Complete Beach Play Set】: Our 12-piece foldable beach toy set for kids includes 1 folding bucket, 10 beach toys, and a mesh storage bag. Perfect for building sandcastles, playing with marine animals, and enjoying hours of creative play at the beach or in the garden.

⛱【Foldable Bucket Design】: The innovative folding bucket saves space in your beach bag and car. It can be easily unfolded for play and folded for storage, making it an ideal choice for family travel and vacation.

⛱【Educational Marine Life Models】: Our sand molds feature cute turtles, fish, and more, encouraging children to learn about marine life while playing. Great for developing children's fine motor skills and creativity.
⛱【Safe and Durable Material】: Our sand play kit is made of non-toxic plastic and are durable. The smooth edges and child-friendly design make it safe for children a tged 3 and aboveo play.

⛱【Comes with a portable net bag】: All toys of bucket and spade beach set can be neatly stored in the included net bag, and the sand can be easily shaken off. Convenient and quick cleanup, easy to go to and from the beach.
description: Product description Details: Show the fun: foldable beach toy set for kids, ready for adventure! 1.Our 12-piece foldable beach toy set for kids offers endless fun at the beach, in the garden, and even in the bathtub. The foldable bucket, assorted molds, and sand tools give your child everything they need for creative play. Watch them build elaborate sand castles, create sculptures of sea creatures, and explore their imaginations. 2.The highlight of portable outdoor sandpit toys for children is our innovative foldable bucket. Unlike traditional bulky beach buckets, this bucket folds flat for easy storage and unfolds when you're ready to play. It's perfect for families who value convenience without sacrificing fun. This bucket takes up minimal space in a suitcase or car trunk when stored. Attributes: Material: Plastic Package size: 22.8*20*11cm/8.97*7.87*4.33inch Product size: As shown in the picture Package weight: 0.45kg Package contents: 10* Beach toys 1* Foldable bucket 1* Storage bag Warm tips: 1.
